missionProperties.startingObjective: Remove the tree blocking the clearing.
missionProperties.missionInfo:
{-} The neutral mission tokens form a fallen tree. The fallen tree is blocking terrain. A hero can interact with the fallen tree to try and push it out of the way.
{-} The mission will progress when the Rebels enter the clearing.
{-} The Rebels lose at the end of Round 5 or when all heroes are wounded.

changeRepositionOverride.theText: Block access to the hidden supplies.

globalEvents.name: Open Crate 1
globalEvents.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

entityProperties.name: Crate1
entityProperties.theText: An old supply crate.

globalEvents.name: Open Crate 2
globalEvents.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

entityProperties.name: Crate2
entityProperties.theText: An old supply crate.

globalEvents.name: Mission Briefing
globalEvents.eventText:
You move cautiously through the forest brush toward the site of the abandoned Rebel hideout. Though Alliance Intelligence assured you the raiding team has moved on, they also gave warning of vicious wildlife in the area.

{-} Deploy the heroes to the blue highlighted space.
{-} The neutral mission tokens form a fallen tree. The fallen tree is blocking terrain. A hero can interact with the fallen tree ({K}) to try and push it out of the way.
{-} The red Rebel mission token represents the hidden supplies. A hero can interact with the hidden supplies ({J}) to claim them.
{-} The mission will progress when a hero claims the hidden supplies.
{-} The Rebels lose at the end of Round 5 or when all heroes are wounded.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels win
globalEvents.eventText:
Weiss continues to fire upon you as your transport gains altitude. Your ship breaks orbit bearing a few more scorch marks, but otherwise you and the supplies remain intact.

{-} The Rebels win the mission!
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 200 credits per hero.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels lose
globalEvents.eventText:
You stumble out of the forest several days later, battered and half-starved. Weiss’s pursuit was merciless, and only through sheer luck did you evade him.

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.
{-} The Empire gains <color="red">General Weiss</color> (Field Commander) as a villain.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

eventActions.theText:
You try to hoist the tree and pull it away.

{-} Test {K}. Apply +1 {B} for each strain token on the tree, then discard all strain tokens on the tree. Enter the number of successes below.

inputList.theText:
You make some progress, but the tree is still blocking the way. You need to keep trying.

{-} For each {B} result, place 1 strain token on the tree.

globalEvents.name: Tree Remove Success
globalEvents.eventText:
Groaning, you drag the fallen tree to the side, making way 

{-} Discard all tree tokens.
{-} The first time a Rebel figure enters one of the highlighted spaces, click the highlight and select "Enter Clearing".

entityProperties.name: Tree 1
entityProperties.theText:
A fallen tree is blocking the way to the entrance. It looks heavy.

{-} A hero can interact with the tree ({K}) to try and remove it.

entityProperties.name: Tree 2
entityProperties.theText:
A fallen tree is blocking the way to the entrance. It looks heavy.

{-} A hero can interact with the tree ({K}) to try and remove it.

entityProperties.name: Tree 3
entityProperties.theText:
A fallen tree is blocking the way to the entrance. It looks heavy.

{-} A hero can interact with the tree ({K}) to try and remove it.

entityProperties.name: Enter Clearing
entityProperties.theText: {-} The first time a Rebel figure enters one of the highlighted spaces, click "Enter Clearing".

eventActions.theText:
You hastily start to search for the supplies.

{-} Test {J}. Apply +1 {B} for each strain token on the mission token, then discard all strain tokens on the mission token. Enter the number of successes below.

inputList.theText:
The supplies are well hidden. You need to keep trying.

{-} Place 1 strain token on the hiding place for each {B} result gained.

globalEvents.name: Strike Team
globalEvents.eventText:
You hear a sinister voice amplified through the forest. “You cannot escape, Rebels! If you surrender willingly, we may choose to be merciful. I will not make the same promise if you run.”

{-} The red Rebel mission token represents the hidden supplies. A hero can interact with the hidden supplies ({J}) to search for them.
{-} The mission will progress when the hidden supplies are found.

entityProperties.name: Enter Clearing
entityProperties.theText: {-} The first time a Rebel figure enters one of the highlighted spaces, click "Enter Clearing".

entityProperties.name: Crate1
entityProperties.theText: An old supply crate.

entityProperties.name: Terminal 1
entityProperties.theText: An old comm station sits on the top of the stairs.

entityProperties.name: Supply Cache
entityProperties.theText:
The supplies should be hidden somewhere around this area.

{-} A hero can interact with the Rebel token ({J}) to search for the supplies.

eventActions.theText:
{-} The red Rebel mission token represents the hidden supplies. A hero can interact with the hidden supplies ({J}) to search for them.
{-} The mission will progress when the hidden supplies are found.
{-} The Rebels lose at the end of Round 5 or when all heroes are wounded.

globalEvents.name: Extract
globalEvents.eventText:
You finally find the supplies and grab them.

{-} A hero can interact with the terminal ({I}) to call for an extraction.
{-} The mission will progress when the heroes call for extraction.
{-} The Rebels lose at the end of Round 5, when all heroes are wounded, or when the hero carrying the supply cache withdraws (click the terminal and select "Hero withdraws").

entityProperties.name: Terminal 1
entityProperties.theText:
An old comm station sits on the top of the stairs.

{-} A hero can interact with the terminal ({I}) to call for an extraction.

entityProperties.name: Supply Cache
entityProperties.theText:
The supplies should be hidden somewhere around this area.

{-} A hero can interact with the Rebel token ({J}) to search for the supplies.

eventActions.theText: Block access to the terminal and the Entrance.

{-} A hero can interact with the terminal ({I}) to call for an extraction.
{-} The mission will progress when the heroes call for extraction.
{-} The Rebels lose at the end of Round 5, when all heroes are wounded, or when the hero carrying the supply cache withdraws (click the terminal and select "Hero withdraws").

globalEvents.name: Call for Extraction
globalEvents.eventText:
{-} The green Rebel mission token represents the exit. The hero with the hidden supplies can escape through the exit.
{-} The Rebels win when the hero with the hidden supplies escapes through the exit.
{-} The Rebels lose at the end of Round 5, when all heroes are wounded, or when the hero carrying the supply cache withdraws (click the terminal and select "Hero withdraws").

entityProperties.name: Exit
entityProperties.theText:
The path from where you came leads back into the underbrush, where you could easily lose the Imperial forces.

{-} The hero with the hidden supplies can escape through the exit, ending the mission.
{-} The Rebels lose when the hero with the hidden supplies withdraws. If that happens, click "Hero withdraws".
